name: Final Call to Arms
description:
Vietnam war Top-down shooter. Join a platoon  with unique AI medic healing system in the heat of the vietnam war fighting against keen enemy units with a unique medic system and attack commands. A keyboard and mouse are required for this game. 

 After you complete your training you will be dropped off at our command post where you will load up on the transport helicopter and be deployed to the battlefield.  Goodluck!

** Holding down spacebar will allow you to go prone and decrease your chances of getting injured by enemy fire by 90% aswell as stabilizing your accuracy for pinpoint results during the heat of the moment.
